item.title: I Am Sartana, Trade Your Guns for a Coffin
item.description: Sartana's Here… Trade Your Pistol for a Coffin is a 1970 spaghetti western that is the third of the Sartana film series with George Hilton taking over the lead role from Gianni Garko. The film was shot in Italy and directed by Giuliano Carnimeo.

item.title: Ringo the Lone Rider
item.description: Ringo the Lone Rider is a 1968 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti western film directed by Rafael Romero Marchent.

item.title: Killer Adios
item.description: Killer Adios is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western directed by Primo Zeglio.

item.title: A Coffin for the Sheriff
item.description: A Coffin for the Sheriff is a 1965 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Mario Caiano and starring Anthony Steffen, Eduardo Fajardo, Fulvia Franco, George Rigaud and Armando Calvo.
